page.title: 13ESSENTIAL SERVICES
page.content: In our area there are two hospitals, Nether Edge and The Royal Hallamshire. Nether Edge was once a workhouse. It has four specialities: a Maternity unit, an Antenatal clinic, a Stroke unit and a Rheumatism clinic. There are two wards for the younger disabled. The average age is below 60. The Royal Hallamshire, planned in 1940, was opened in 1978. Since then, 0.25 million people have been treated. There are 728 beds with 87 spare for emergencies. In the operating theatre the surgeons have spent 0.25 million pounds on instruments. They have to wash hands for 10 minutes before operations. {COMMUNITY POLICE In the Heeley area there is a Community Police Officer and the Panda car patrols. The Community policeman walks around and is helpful to people.
